help-file.title: "MASK"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Self Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Illusion
This spell works similar to the disguise skill allowing the caster to take on the appearance of any player in the game. Anyone with detect illusion has a chance to see that this is an illusion.
syntax: cast 'mask' playername -to change your appearance cast 'mask' self or me -to remove the illusion
